body.name: Travel Steamer for Clothes Mini - Small Foldable Handheld Garment Steamer - Personal Compact Size Clothing Portable Steamer for Traveling - Travel Steam Iron Mini
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 8 hrs 20 mins
features: ULTRA COMPACT DESIGN - Our mini steamer is as small as a thermos (2.7"D x 7.5"H) and features a PATENTED DESIGN. Free up valuable space in your carry-on suitcase.
QUICK HEATS UP - Save time with our travel size steamer that heats up in just 25 seconds after plugging it in.
EFFORTLESS OPERATION - With the convenient on/off steam output button, you can steam your clothes without constantly holding it down.
POWERFUL STEAM - Operates at only 800 watts while still delivering stable and powerful steam. One tank full last approximately 10 minutes.

NO WORRIES ABOUT WATER LEAKS - Equipped with a 130mL fixed water tank, our travel steamer eliminates concerns about leakage or improper assembly. It's just the perfect size for travel, utilizing the exact amount of water required for optimal performance, leaving no residual water behind.
ENHANCED SAFETY - Our mini travel steamer comes with a 3-pronged plug and a thick power cord for added safety. The boil-dry protection, spill-proof, and leak-proof features ensure safe operation.
VERSATILE STEAMING - This mini travel steamer can be used vertically or horizontally, eliminating the need for an ironing board. Ideal for a quick and hassle-free de-wrinkling process.
QUICK AND EFFICIENT FOR YOUR BUSY LIFESTYLE - Perfect for morning outfit touch-ups, traveling, weddings, or any special occasion. Simply fill, plug, and watch the wrinkles disappear.
EFFECTIVES ON VARIOUS FABRICS - The mini steamer works seamlessly on silk, wool, cotton, linen, nylon, and denim, maintaining your clothes' quality while ensuring they're wrinkle-free.
TRAVEL-FRIENDLY - This travel steamer operates seamlessly in the US, Canada, and other countries that utilize a 110V power supply.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Are you tired of dealing with wrinkled clothes but don't have the time or space for traditional steamers? Introducing the TONTATTA Mini Steamer TTTPS618, the ultimate solution for your wrinkle woes. TONTATTA TTTPS618 is the ideal solution for wrinkle-free clothes in a hurry. It is compact, heats up quickly, offers powerful steam, ensures enhanced safety, works on various fabrics, and is extremely travel-friendly. This product is designed to deliver high quality, efficient and hassle-free de-wrinkling.
PATENTED DESIGN: 2.7"D x 7.5"H Compact Size for Easy Travel Experience the convenience of our travel size steamer, designed with travel in mind. Dimensions of 2.7"D x 7.5"H and a patented design.
One-Press Steam Output Button: Simplify your steaming process with our intuitive on/off switch. Making your steaming experience effortless and efficient.
Safety Components for Peace of Mind: Our portable clothes steamer is equipped with essential safety features.
Versatile Orientation: Experience the flexibility of vertical or horizontal steaming for wrinkle-free perfection.

User-friendly Operation: Important Reminders: To ensure safe usage, please keep the following in mind: WATER FIRST: Always ensure you add water before connecting the mini travel steamer to the power supply to prevent dry burning.CAUTION HOT: Be aware that the nozzle of the travel steamer head can become extremely hot, and touching it can result in burns.SUPERVISION REQUIRED: Never leave the handheld garment steamer unattended when it's plugged in.POWER DOWN: Always unplug the portable steamer after each use.COOL DOWN: Before storing, allow the mini steamer to cool down. Avoid placing it on flammable surfaces while it's still hot.VOLTAGE CHECK: Please verify that your local power source is compatible with the 110V specification of this product. Enjoy the convenience and efficiency of our compact mini steamer, ensuring wrinkle-free clothes wherever you go.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love this steamer! Does exactly what it’s supposed to do! It’s super light, doesn’t take up a lot of space, so it’s great for traveling! My only complaint, is that the cord is super short! I literally have to hold the items I want to steam with one hand and then steam the items with the other hand. The cord is not long enough to hang my items on a door, etc and steam them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars this portable excellent for travel use
reviews.reviewText: Raed a lot of positive reviews, bought one based on that and this product does not disappoint. I travel for work several times a year and some clothes cannot be ironed so a streamer is needed. This one, it has a folding handle so it packs small in the suitcase. The biggest surprise was how much steam this generates. I've used it a couple of times and it has worked out really well. The water tank is small but that is to be expected due to the size of this steamer. During the last two business trips when I used it, it didn't leak in any way. worked really well. To avoid any issues with clogging, I used distilled water. I was able to pick some up from nearest Walmart during my business trip.I highly recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Useful, & Travel Friendly
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this to help me with my bridesmaids robes, and dresses on the day of my wedding. Not only did it come with a water funnel for mess free refills, it also came with a brush top to assist with a seamless steam as well as a bag to place all my items in. It was compact, perfect size to travel with and it getting hot in a short amount of time which again, being on a crunch for the time the day of a wedding was extremely needed. Remember to unplug it once use is finished because again it gets hot to successfully remove wrinkles. I would absolutely purchase from this company again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Travel Steamer
reviews.reviewText: I would recommend this product. The size is convenient and works great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Hard to fill
reviews.reviewText: Idk why it’s designed with a tiny hole to fill the water, you need a funnel every time to fill it. Also doesn’t steam continuously, spits water out, terrible product

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I thought this would be smaller. It’s clunky, the handle is awkward, and the cord on the handle is very thick, short, and not flexible. It steams fine though.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We purchased the steamer for travel. We were headed to a destination wedding and needed the steamer to freshen up our attire. We tested it prior to leaving and it worked great. We packed it in our carry-on luggage to ensure it would be protected. When we went to use it a second time it did not steam and leaked water everywhere. It sadly was a waste of money and waste of space in our luggage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I had been wanting a travel steamer, and this one is not only the perfect size for travel, it's great to use at home. It heats up quickly and puts out lots of steam.
